John Johnson

  1. Foster Name: Fred
  2. Alternate Foster Name: Frederick Sass
  3. Foster Family: Herman and Sallie B. Sass
  4. Location of Family: West Point, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: West Point, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 3
  8. Date of Birth: 1906-07-29, Canada
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Cuming Democrat, 29 October 1909; West Point Republican, 29 October 1909; Find-A-Grave for Fred Sass; Patricia J. Young, and Frances E. Marks. Tears on Paper: The History and Life Stories of the Orphan Train Riders (n.p., 1990), p. 329-333; 1920 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex.
